onMovedToScrapHeap(android.view.View).Description: Indicates that the specified View was moved into the recycler's scrap heap. The view is not displayed on screen any more and any expensive resource associated with the view should be discarded.

ClassDesc: A RecyclerListener is used to receive a notification whenever a View is placed inside the RecycleBin's scrap heap. This listener is used to free resources associated to Views placed in the RecycleBin.
